price: ߊ߬ ߓߍ߫ ߒ ߣߌ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߕߍ߫ ߒ ߘߌ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߘߐߓߍ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߖߏ߭ ߟߎ߬ ߞߊߡߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߐߘߏ߲߬ߣߍ߲ ߞߐ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߥߊ߫
arabic: وَتَٱللَّهِ لَأَكِيدَنَّ أَصۡنَٰمَكُم بَعۡدَ أَن تُوَلُّواْ مُدۡبِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: watal-lahi la-akīdanna aṣnāmakum baʿda an tuwallū mud'birīna
